EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Adapting to Digital Disruption_Q215.Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Adapting to Digital Disruption
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline Thank you for registering for the upcoming Adapting to Digital Disruption <http://pivotal.io/adapting-to-digital-disruption/munich> exclusive event in Munich. Please find the event details below.
Date: July 1, 2015 Time: Registration begins at 8:30 Location: BMW World <http://www.bmw-welt.com/de/event_forum/welt_room_discover/business_center.html>, Am Olympiapark 1, 80809 Munich, Germany
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:info@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team <http://pivotal.io>
